name: Stoneplate Enchant
active: Fortify: Gain 40% damage reduction for 2.5 seconds, but deal 60% less damage (90 second cooldown).
tips: Stoneplate EnchantShieldStoneplate (Active): Gain a base shield that absorbs damage equal to 20% of max Health.
Every 1 bonus Armor or Magic Resistance you have increases the shield by 0.1%, up to 35%.
(60s Cooldown) For every enemy nearby, gain an additional shield that absorbs damage equal to 5% of max Health, capped at 3 enemies.
Every 1 bonus Armor or Magic Resistance you have increases the shield by 0.1%, up to 12%.
